1.2. Initialisation¶

global.init.init()¶

Initialises global functions.

Invokes
global.init.navInit(), global.init.unreadStatus()
global.init.navInit()¶

Initialises the navigation system. Toggles the active-tab and active-more-tab classes on relevant tabs. Attaches event listeners.

Invokes
global.event.moreMenuClick(), global.event.darkenOverlayClick(), global.event.navMoreHide()
Invoked by
global.init.init()
global.init.unreadStatus()¶

Sets the unread messages flag on Inbox tab.

Invokes
axios.post()
Invoked by
global.init.init()
